 Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint).  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement: drsb1 $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( [ z / x ] ph <-> [ z / y ] ph ) ) $.
